newsitem.title: UK: Cadbury up as SBC Warburg upgrades.
newsitem.headline: Cadbury up as SBC Warburg upgrades.

text.p: Shares in Cadbury Schweppes Plc rose on Wednesday as analysts at SBC Warburg upgraded the stock following upbeat presentations by company executives to analysts and fund managers, dealers said.
The stock was up 13p at 538-1/2 by 1309 GMT, in volume just short of 1.9 million shares.
Sources said SBC Warburg raised its rating on the stock to "buy" from "add," though analysts at the investment bank declined comment.
